codelists.definition: Terminology codelist used for units within CDISC.
codelists.name: Unit
codelists.preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Unit of Measure Terminology

terms.definition: A unit of measurement of time equal to 60 minutes.
A unit of measurement of time equal to 60 seconds.

codelists.definition: Units of measure for pharmacokinetic data and parameters.
codelists.name: PK Units of Measure
codelists.preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Pharmacokinetic Parameter Unit of Measure Terminology

terms.definition: One hundred times the quotient of one quantity divided by another, with the same units of measurement.
The rate of measured normal activity minus inhibited activity, divided by the rate of normal activity of a given object. It is expressed as a percentage.
